Mayor & City Council
====================

212 E Main Street Cuero TX 77954

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/212+E+Main+Street+Cuero+TX+77954)

212 E Main Street  
Cuero, TX 77954

Mailing Address:

P.O. Box 660  
Cuero, TX 77954

Phone:

[361-275-3476](tel:3612753476)

Fax:

361-275-6265

Link: [Mayor and City Council Page](http://www.cityofcuero.com/175/Mayor-City-Council)
